pullRequest.title: _getArtifact does not fetch all versions
pullRequest.bodyText:
currently, _getArtifact fetches all versions of an artifact, then checks for the first one with valid state. This has 2 problems:

fetching all versions is expensive as all blobs are also fetched
additional metadata query for each version until one with valid state is found

This PR optimizes the _getArtifact by performing at most only 1 query

commit.message: avoid fetching all versions of an artifact

nodes.bodyText: No ANY operand is present on H2 database, that is the reason why tests are fails on CI

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                 "  WHERE artifact_id = '%s' AND key = '%s' AND value = ANY('{%s}'::text[]) " +
          
          
            
                                 "  WHERE artifact_id = '%s' AND key = '%s' AND value IN ('{%s}') " +

commit.message: replace ANY with IN for H2 compatibility
Merge branch 'avoid-fetching-all-versions' of github.com:dang-gyg/apicurio-registry into avoid-fetching-all-versions
